statements: SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT name, age FROM players WHERE age > 25;
SELECT id, position FROM players WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM players ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT id, name, position FROM players WHERE nationality = 'Brazil' AND age < 30;
